title: How to Find and View Liked Posts on Facebook

steps.title: Tap the menu icon.
steps.content: Tap the menu icon. On Android, it's your profile picture in the upper-right corner. On iPhone and iPad, the icon has three lines ( ☰ ) in the lower-right corner.

steps.title: Tap the Gear icon .
steps.content: Tap the Gear icon . It's in the upper-right corner. This opens the Settings menu.

steps.title: Tap Activity log.
steps.content: Tap Activity log . It's below the "Your activity" header on Android. On iPhone and iPad, it's below the "Your Information" header.

steps.title: Tap Your Facebook activity.
steps.content: Tap Your Facebook activity . It's the first option at the top of the menu. On iPad, all of your Facebook activity is listed on a single page. To view liked posts by themselves, tap Category at the top of the page. Then tap Interactions . in the drop-down menu.

steps.title: Tap Comments and reactions.
steps.content: Tap Comments and reactions . This allows you to view comments you've liked or commented on.

steps.title: Tap Likes and reactions.
steps.content: Tap Likes and reactions . It's the second option in the menu. This displays all posts you have liked and reacted to. Tap a post to view it. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Log in to your Facebook account.
steps.content: Log in to your Facebook account. To do so, go to www.facebook.com . If you have not logged in, log in with your username and password .

steps.title: Click your profile icon.
steps.content: Click your profile icon. It's in the upper-right corner. This displays a drop-down menu.

steps.title: Click Settings & privacy.
steps.content: Click Settings & privacy . It's next to an icon that resembles a gear. This displays a different menu.

steps.title: Click Activity log.
steps.content: Click Activity log . It's near the bottom of the menu.

steps.title: Click Your Facebook activity.
steps.content: Click Your Facebook activity . It's at the top of the menu to the left. This expands the Facebook activity menu.

steps.title: Click Comments and reactions.
steps.content: Click Comments and reactions . This displays all posts you've liked or reacted to. Click a post to view it.

steps.title: Tap ☰.
steps.content: Tap ☰ . It's in the upper-right corner. This displays the menu.

steps.title: Tap Settings.
steps.content: Tap Settings . It's below the "Settings & privacy" menu. It's about halfway down the menu.

steps.title: Tap Activity log.
steps.content: Tap Activity log . It's the first option below the "Your information" header.

steps.title: Tap Interactions.
steps.content: Tap Interactions . It's next to a thumbs-up icon. This allows you to view posts you've interacted with.

steps.title: Tap Likes and reactions.
steps.content: Tap Likes and reactions . This displays all posts you've liked and reacted to. Tap a post to view it.
